abstract: José Kléberson Pereira (born 19 June 1979), commonly known as José Kléberson or simply Kléberson, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Indy Eleven in the North American Soccer League. He has played in 32 internationals and was a member of the Brazil squad which won the 2002 FIFA World Cup.
